short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Authorize Fitbit access for Stanford Wearipedia Project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that enables OAuth authentication and data retrieval for Fitbit users participating in the Wearipedia Project conducted by Stanford Snyder Lab.
